ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:04:41 [Issue ID 4000-127147] urn:comicvine:4000-127147 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 12:56:51. [Issue ID 527177]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Unstoppable Mr. Marko: Bruce and Rick hire Cain Marko to take them to the Temple of Cyttorak hoping that the powerful gem inside will help Bruce control the Hulk. Cain betrays them as he uses the gem to once again become the unstoppable Juggernaut. The Hulk stops him.
Mini Marvel Classics: Spidey has a new black costume that becomes a little too attached to him so he turns to the X-Men to try and help him get the alien symbiote off.
ComicInfo.Title: The Unstoppable Mr. Marko; Mini Marvel Classics
